sentences.en: a triangular contest in an election
sentences.cn: 竞选中三位候选人的角逐
一项由三方参加的体育比赛

sentences.en: It's more or less triangular plot of land.
Many deltas are triangular in shape.
sentences.cn: 很多三角洲是三角形的.

sentences.en: Some interpolation on two dimensional Euler space of triangular domain is studied.
sentences.cn: 主要研究了二维欧氏空间三角域上的插值问题.

sentences.en: Such designs were square, diamond , triangular or hexagonal shaped pellet areas.
sentences.cn: 这些设计是正方形的, 菱形的, 三角形的或六角形的小格区域.

sentences.en: The anconeus is a small triangular muscle.
sentences.cn: 肘后肌是一小的三角形肌肉.

sentences.en: The Battle of the Red Cliffs determined the triangular balance of power of the three kingdoms, Wei, Shu and Wu.
sentences.cn: 赤壁之战决定了魏 、 蜀、吴三国鼎足之势.

sentences.en: The small, sharp, triangular beech - nuts lay scattered thickly on the ground.
sentences.cn: 遍地都是厚厚一层三菱形的 、 犀利的小桔子.

sentences.en: The triangular paddle can be multiple paddled and multilayered allocated.
sentences.cn: 三角形桨叶可以多叶和多层配置.

sentences.en: The triangular plot allows all three values to be read off easily.
sentences.cn: 我们使用三角图很容易读出全部三个数值.

sentences.en: There was a triangular scar on his ckeekbone cheekbone.
sentences.cn: 他颧骨上有一块三角形的伤疤.
这样,三角斗争就仍然继续下去.

sentences.en: Timbered cottages stood around a triangular green.
sentences.cn: 几所乡村小木屋环绕在三角形绿地周围。

sentences.en: Triangular matrices, in particular, are usually quite tractable.
sentences.cn: 特别地, 三角矩阵常是十分易于驾驭的.

words.tran_cn: 由三角形组成的；有三角斑纹的
[测] 三角测量；三角形划分
把…分成三角形；使…成三角形；对…作三角测量
[数]三角的，三角形的；三人间的

trans.tran_cn: 三角（形）的，由三个部分构成的，三方面的
